projectPlannersSubtitle: With top-tier resources and a professional team
projectPlannersDescription: We bring together top industry experts and professionals, including a gold-medal legal team, as well as experienced educational experts and language trainers. Our team is committed to providing you with customized education and immigration solutions, ensuring that every student and client can have the best experience in studying and living in Canada.

teamMembers.name: Jay Liu
teamMembers.description:
Chairman of Montreal International Education Center
Chairman of the Board, Union University of Canada
Vice President of Canada International Education Bureau
Chairman of the Francophone International Education Alliance (Canada)

teamMembers.name: Josee Bouchard
teamMembers.description:
Chair of the Canadian Council for Educational Excellence
Chair of the Teachers' Council
Former Chair of the Quebec French Education Bureau Federation

teamMembers.name: Marcus Tabachnick
teamMembers.description:
Director of the Board, Montreal International Education Center
Chair of the Quebec English School Boards Association
Former Chair of the Canadian School Boards Association
Director of the Montreal School Board
Recipient of the Queen Elizabeth II Silver Jubilee Medal

teamMembers.name: Brock Zhao
teamMembers.description: CEO of Montreal International Education Center

teamSubtitle: We bring together top industry experts including a team of lawyers, education experts, certified immigration consultants, and French instructors

sections.title: Expert Consultants
sections.description: Our team of expert consultants consists of renowned scholars and industry elites from both domestic and international circles. They have profound backgrounds and extensive practical experience in fields such as educational management, economic research, and industry-education collaboration. With guidance and consultation from these experts, the Montreal International Education Center is committed to providing you with the most cutting-edge educational concepts and the most effective immigration solutions, helping your study abroad and immigration dreams come true.

sections.title: Admissions Team
sections.description: Our admissions team is led by Mr. Tony Liu, an experienced admissions director, dedicated to providing each student with personalized educational consulting and admission support.

sections.title: Instructors Team
sections.description: We have gathered a team of instructors made up of experienced and accomplished education experts. Our team members not only have profound academic backgrounds but also rich practical experience, capable of providing unique insights and high-quality teaching to students.

sections.title: Legal Team
sections.description: Our legal team consists of experts with rich experience and deep backgrounds in international relations and immigration law. Our legal team is committed to providing clients with professional legal guidance and support, including but not limited to representing clients in deportation orders, extradition requests, and spousal sponsorship appeals.

consultantTeams.name: Lai Xiang Sun
consultantTeams.description: Former Vice President of Fudan University, Deputy Head of the National Undergraduate Teaching Assessment Expert Group of the Ministry of Education of China, and Chief Assessment Expert of the Shanghai Educational Assessment Institute

consultantTeams.name: Wei Ping Li
consultantTeams.description: Secretary-General of the Shanghai International Education Exchange Association

admissionsTeams.name: Tony Liu
admissionsTeams.description: Admissions head for Matrix College & Veritas College

admissionsTeams.name: Sylvain Langlois
admissionsTeams.description: Director of the French Language Examination Center in Quebec, Canada, and Director of the Inter-Edu Education Center in Canada

teachersTeams.name: Eleni
teachersTeams.description: Member of Parliament, former Minister of Justice and Attorney General of the Federal Government
